name: The 10th International Conference on Business, Management and Governance
content: Paper Publication: The accepted papers after proper registration will be published in below journal. Publication in International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology (IJIMT). Submissions will be peer-reviewed by the program committee members and journal editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in IJIMT. ISSN: 2010-0248, DOI: 10.18178/IJIMT Indexing: Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref and ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library.
